dmca.title: DMCA Notification - ISP - asyelectronics.com/Sony Home Audio
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Notifications [mailto:notifications@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Thursday, April 05, 2007 9:25 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: DMCA Notification - ISP - asyelectronics.com/Sony Home Audio

 

 

 



 

 

 

4/5/2007 

copyright@theplanet.com

RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED

 

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

George Poletes

1333 North Stemmons Freeway Suite 110

Dallas TX 75207

 

Re:  Unauthorized Use of Sony's Trademarks and/or Copyrighted Materials

 

Dear Designated Agent:

 

We have been retained by our client, Net Enforcers, Inc. to contact you with respect
to unauthorized use of Sony's trademarks and/or copyrighted materials.  

 

Sony has retained Net Enforcers to assist with the protection and enforcement of its
rights in Sony-owned or licensed trademarks, logos, and other copyrighted materials.
 Net Enforcers has in turn retained us to assist with this matter.  Pursuant to 17
U.S.C.
